greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(i,j) is the number of i-permutations of 14 objects a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n, with repetition allowed, containing j a's.
comment: Mirror image of A123187. - _Philippe Deléham_, Dec 27 2007
maple: for i from 0 to 7 do seq(binomial(i, j)*13^(i-j), j = 0 .. i) od;
results.author: _Zerinvary Lajos_, with help from Emeric Deutsch, Dec 21 2007
